snippet: John Tavares’s goal broke a third-period tie and lifted the Islanders to their second win in seven games.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Boston Bruins, 3-2; other NHL scores noted.
lead_paragraph: John Tavares’s goal broke a third-period tie and lifted the Islanders to their second win in seven games.

headline.seo: Islanders Beat Bruins on the Road
headline.main: Islanders End Cold Spell With Late Goal at Boston
headline.print_headline: Islanders End Cold Spell With Late Goal at Boston
